extendedInfo.description: Introducing now COACH for hockey.  Built with knowledge.  Designed for creating your own.now COACH library   - over 200 professionally animated plays  - features hockey plays, drills, and systems  - practice playbooks (flow practices uploaded)now COACH interface  - timeline for recording, editing, and playback  - coach's draw pad  - coach's clipboard for play instructions

reviews.comment: Nice tool, but on tablet it would get five stars if it just had a few easier features, like making the players size smaller to help in longer drills and for notes. It is close to being a very strong tool, but lacks a few basics. Nice for price though!
reviews.author: Dennis Woods

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: So easy to use! And great to show plays to my athletes!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good, but
reviews.comment: Can be a bit cumbersome to get the passing right.  Needs an export to gif feature for easy sharing.
reviews.author: Derek Orr

reviews.title: From tigers
reviews.comment: Cool and easy to use.  the boys find easier to view and understand the drills
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: X
reviews.comment: Excellent. The large number of included drills make this a must have.
reviews.author: Julie Sanderson

reviews.comment: Great little program for coachs. Best one out there thats free.EZ to use make plays that everone can see.
reviews.author: Alex Acosta

reviews.title: Great App for all hockey coaches.
reviews.comment: Love it.  Great app, especially for the price.  Easy to use and has great features.  Really like the play recorder feature and how easy it is.  I have a couple of suggestions on changes that we will email to the developers.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best Coach\'s Assistant Playbook Around!
reviews.comment: Easy to use with a simple interface for creating fully animated plays.  Can\'t wait to see what\'s in store for the next release.  Keep up the good work!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome.
reviews.comment: Making fully aninated drills is really easy, I like the category system too.  The drills and plays the app come with are great.
reviews.author: A Google User
